attributes.action: eradicate prepayment meters as they are fat too confusing for the poor call center worker to understand...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prepayment meters are a piece of nonsense and coupled with redicolously complicated systems make the poor call center workers life a living hell. Credit meters for all please!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
